articles.title: Singapore Air, one of world's best airlines, is hiring cabin crew again after two-year freeze - The Star Online
articles.description: Singapore Airlines Ltd. has resumed recruitment of cabin crew, ending a hiring freeze over the past two years as the Covid-19 pandemic decimated air travel around the world, Channel News Asia reported on Saturday.
